entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:52 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
